data.taskTitle: Implement Claude CLI Fallback Configuration System
Implement Claude CLI Fallback Configuration System
data.approach: Analyze existing implementation from squad-gygxz - the core CLI fallback is already implemented in claudeCli.ts and being used in 3 endpoints. Need to design a configuration system to allow user preferences for API vs CLI.

data.taskTitle: Implement Claude CLI Fallback Configuration System
summary: Created LLM provider configuration system with three modes: auto (API with CLI fallback), api-only, and cli-only
Added LlmProviderEditor.svelte component with full UI for provider settings
Created llmService.ts with centralized llmCall() function and provider status detection
Integrated LLM tab into Config page under Settings category
